patch 8.2.2353: spartql files are not detected

Problem:    Spartql files are not detected.
Solution:   Add the sparql filetype.  (closes #7679)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/d44cc593cee84fc3c712ca1828d1574f80700383|patch 8.2.2352: if focus lost/gained is received twice code is not ig…>
patch 8.2.2352: if focus lost/gained is received twice code is not ignored

Problem:    If the focus lost/gained escape sequence is received twice it is
            not ignored. (Christ van Willigen)
Solution:   Adjust the logic to ignore the escape code.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2352: if focus lost/gained is received twice code is not ig… · vim/vim@d44cc59
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2352: if focus lost/gained is received twice code is not ig… · vim/vim@d44cc59
attachments.text: …nored Problem: If the focus lost/gained escape sequence is received twice it is not ignored. (Christ van Willigen) Solution: Adjust the logic to ignore the escape code.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/8f81b22e8691f6e7c76153e945bbef15a8190cd9|patch 8.2.2351: Vim9: error msg for "throw" in function called with "…>
patch 8.2.2351: Vim9: error msg for "throw" in function called with "silent!"

Problem:    Vim9: error message for "throw" in function that was called with
            "silent!".
Solution:   Do not throw the exception when not caught or displayed.
            (closes #7672)

patch 8.2.2350: using "void" for no reason

Problem:    Using "void" for no reason.
Solution:   Use "char *".

attachments.title: patch 8.2.2350: using "void" for no reason · vim/vim@033135e
attachments.text: Problem: Using "void" for no reason. Solution: Use "char *".

patch 8.2.2349: Vim9: cannot handle line break after parenthesis at line end

Problem:    Vim9: cannot handle line break after parenthesis at line end.
Solution:   Skip over line break. (closes #7677)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2349: Vim9: cannot handle line break after parenthesis at l… · vim/vim@2415669
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2349: Vim9: cannot handle line break after parenthesis at l… · vim/vim@2415669

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/fadd55bd633b3b84d41a691e953f569bb6c21689|patch 8.2.2348: no check for modified files after focus gained>
patch 8.2.2348: no check for modified files after focus gained

Problem:    No check for modified files after focus gained. (Mathias Stearn)
Solution:   Call ui_focus_change().

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2348: no check for modified files after focus gained · vim/vim@fadd55b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2348: no check for modified files after focus gained · vim/vim@fadd55b
attachments.text: Problem: No check for modified files after focus gained. (Mathias Stearn) Solution: Call ui_focus_change().

Solution:   Add #ifdef.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/845b72854de90de13879598df53f1c388e52e1ba|patch 8.2.2346: Codecov reports every little coverage drop>
patch 8.2.2346: Codecov reports every little coverage drop

Problem:    Codecov reports every little coverage drop.
Solution:   Tolerate a 0.05% drop. Hide the appveyor config file. (Ozaki
            Kiichi, closes #7678)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2346: Codecov reports every little coverage drop · vim/vim@845b728
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2346: Codecov reports every little coverage drop · vim/vim@845b728
attachments.text: Problem: Codecov reports every little coverage drop. Solution: Tolerate a 0.05% drop. Hide the appveyor config file. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #7678)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/681fc3fa782e99fe69ed2c83c3e29109d2d61e1a|patch 8.2.2345: no focus events in a terminal>
patch 8.2.2345: no focus events in a terminal

Problem:    No focus events in a terminal.
Solution:   Add the t_fd and t_fe termcap entries and implement detecting
            focus events. (Hayaki Saito, Magnus Groß, closes #7673,
            closes #609, closes #5526)
